import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function Contact() { const [user, setuser] = useState({ name: "", email: "", contact:"", subject: "", message: "" }) const postDataOnFirebase= async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); const res = await fetch ( "https://data-store-61c2c-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/", { name: user.name, email: user.email, contact:user.contact, subject: user.subject, message: user.message } ) } const getUserData =(e) => { const name=e.target.name; const value=e.target.value; setuser({...user, [name]: value}) } return (
